attributes.action: Make deframption  were people can sue people for deframption of there reputation
attributes.additional_details: There are people ruining the reputation to others and this will prevent victims from there reputation been ruined been driven to suicide and prevent them from haveing mental health issues òr added stress òr even violance to them  witch can lead to allsorts of illnesses
attributes.background: I want for this to be made law in scotland às there are people ruining peoples reputation in scotland and all the uk and getting away with it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
